verses.verse: חַכְמ֣וֹת <S%H2454><s%> chach-Mot Every wise נָ֭שִׁים <S%H802><s%> Na-shim woman בָּנְתָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> ba-ne-Tah buildeth בֵיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Tah; her house וְ֝אִוֶּ֗לֶת <S%H200><s%> ve-'iv-Ve-let, but the foolish בְּיָדֶ֥יהָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dei-ha with her hands תֶהֶרְסֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2040><s%> te-her-Sen-nu. plucketh it down

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech He that walketh בְּ֭יָשְׁרוֹ <S%H3476><s%> be-ya-she-ro in his uprightness יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וּנְל֖וֹז <S%H3868><s%> u-ne-Loz but [he that is] perverse דְּרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav in his ways בּוֹזֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H959><s%> bo-Ze-hu. despiseth

בִּקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> bik-kesh- seeketh לֵ֣ץ <S%H3887><s%> letz A scorner חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וָאָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> va-'A-yin; and none וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> ve-Da-'at and [findeth it] not but knowledge לְנָב֣וֹן <S%H995><s%> le-na-Von unto him that understandeth נָקָֽל׃ <S%H7043><s%> na-Kal. [is] easy

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Leave מִ֭נֶּגֶד <S%H5048><s%> Min-ne-ged from the presence לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish man כְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> ke-Sil; of a foolish וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> u-val- you will not יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, when thou perceivest שִׂפְתֵי־ <S%H8193><s%> sif-tei- not [in him] the lips דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at. of knowledge

[is] deceit

[is] heaviness
